title: This one is the CREEPIEST movie I have ever seen..
review: Well I really never wrote any review in my life. I love horror movies, Lot of time I get a jump scare watching em, but this one, in the last I really shouted lol.. Thats so creepy and scary.. It will make you think whats next.. All the horror movie lovers should watch this one. Acting story evrything is awesome. At the beginning you will feel that its not that scary but things totally changes later on. Awesome!!

title: Its pretty good movie.. This people who rated it in negative are crazy.
review: Well its all combined nice endgame movie. Lot of surprises, emotions, laugh and fight.. its an whole package.
